ai-patthana14.13:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma ladies that are difficult for the living, etc.,
ai-patthana14.13:1.1_0: Excellent teaching gives rise to the cause, not without reason.
ai-patthana14.13:1.1_1: Endowed with the teaching doesn’t give rise to the defilement of the teaching.
ai-patthana14.13:1.1_2: thoughts that are cause and reasoned with causes.
ai-patthana14.13:2.1_0: Or consciousness doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.13:2.1_1: Not by the teaching doesn’t give rise to the cause, nor reason.
ai-patthana14.13:2.1_2: thoughts that are not a cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.13:3.1_0: ‘Our teaching doesn’t give rise to the defilement, not without defilement.
ai-patthana14.13:3.1_1: and he doesn’t give rise to the teaching. ...
ai-patthana14.13:3.1_2: thoughts that are no cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.13:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
